document_data.name: Thianos
document_data.mainbody:
'''Thianos''', nicknamed '''"Ironskull"''', was a male [[dwarf]] [[cleric]] of [[Moradin]] who lived in the town of [[Llorkh]] in the [[Savage Frontier]] in the late 1350s [[DR]].

Following his takeover of Llorkh in the [[1357 DR|Year of the Prince, 1357 DR]], Lord [[Geildarr Ithym]] named Thianos an outlaw and ordered the [[Lord's Men]] to find him.

He was considered aged at the time.
